3: It's getting cold anyway, guess I'll head back earlier. Grandpa must still be waiting for me.
I only found these rusted parts, but we should be able to exchange them for something!
This weird thing is too heavy, I can't move it... But it doesn't look like it's worth much anyway.
Let's go before the dummy comes back.
Grandpa? Grandpa! What happened?! ...There's so much blood?!
Grandpa... hid the bread... Look... Karen's... Karen's bread... Ha...
You... What did you do to Grandpa?! Give those back!
The crazy old nutter still hasn't kicked the bucket yet? I should've just—
